text: RT @MMFlint Backstage now with Bernie Sanders. Our National Town Hall starts in 15 minutes on Facebook Live! Join us at https://facebook.com/MMFlint from 7-8:30pm ET. Also streaming on The Guardian and Now This. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DYr4UijW0AAevGd.jpg

RT @RepRoKhanna Extreme wealth and income inequality is not only a moral issue, but the largest constraint on our future economic growth. I look forward to hearing @SenSanders and @SenWarren's town meeting on the issue tonight at 7pm ET. I will be live tweeting in response. https://twitter.com/SenSanders/status/974401042526932992 QT @SenSanders Whether or not it's talked about on the major networks, income and wealth inequality is one of the defining issues of our time. Please join me, @SenWarren, @MMFlint, @DarrickHamilton and others on Facebook Monday, March 19 for an incredibly important discussion. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/974399454676750339/img/YqIiBk8MVfFPbjH9.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/974399454676750339/vid/240x240/8tcMEkaF2DVHZyFz.mp4
